name: CMSoundDescriptionFlavor
desc: Types that represent sound format descriptions.

items.name: static let isoFamily: CMSoundDescriptionFlavor
items.desc: A sound description that selects the ISO family sample format.

items.name: static let mobile3GPFamily: CMSoundDescriptionFlavor
items.desc: A sound description that selects the 3GP family sample format.

items.name: static let quickTimeMovie: CMSoundDescriptionFlavor
items.desc: A sound description that selects the QuickTime movie format.

items.name: static let quickTimeMovieV2: CMSoundDescriptionFlavor
items.desc: A sound description that selects the second version of the QuickTime movie format.
